General.Name: NoHo Partners Oyj
General.Description: NoHo Partners Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the restaurant business. The company's restaurant concepts include Elite, Savoy, Teatteri, Sea Horse, Yes Yes Yes, Stefan's Steakhouse, Palace, Löyly, Hanko Aasia, Friends & Brgrs, Campingen, and Cock's & Cows. It operates restaurants, entertainment venues, and fast food restaurants in Finland, Denmark, and Norway. The company was formerly known as Restamax Oyj and changed its name to NoHo Partners Oyj in December 2018. NoHo Partners Oyj was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tampere, Finland.
